Hello,

You can use EXTRAKICKS coupon for 200GB of extra disk space and 4GB extra RAM. It is valid for KVM HDD Plus package. The VPS specs are listed below:

**KVM HDD Plus**

<pre>
2 vCPU core AMD Opteron 6128
Unlimited CPU cores 2GHz
8GB ECC RAM (12GB with a coupon)
200GB HDD RAID-1 (400GB with a coupon)
Linux/Windows OS
Unmetered 250Mbps bandwidth
1 IPv4
DDoS protection
Control Panel - OpenNebula
Location - France (OVH)
Price - $6.99/mo
Link - https://www.wishosting.com/order/config/index/VPS/?group_id=2&pricing_id=35
</pre>

The payment gateway is 2Checkout (PayPal) and CoinPayments (BTC, BCH, ETH).

For anyone interested, there is also an affiliate program - https://www.wishosting.com/plugin/support_manager/knowledgebase/view/18/affiliate-program/1/
